languages.text: "Если опустить тот факт, что это чудовищно дерзкая выходка, в ходе которой все, скорее всего, погибнут... План вообще-то неплох".
"A fine plan, apart from it being an insanely audacious one that will almost certainly get everyone killed."
languages.original_text: "Если опустить тот факт, что это чудовищно дерзкая выходка, в ходе которой все, скорее всего, погибнут... План вообще-то неплох".

traits.locale_text: "The plan is fine... despite the fact that it is an insanely audacious one that probably will get everyone killed in the process."
"The plan is fine... despite the fact that it is an insanely audacious one that probably will get everyone killed in the process."
"The plan is fine, except it's an insanely audacious one that probably will get everyone killed in the process."
"The plan is fine, except it's an insanely audacious one that probably will get everyone killed in the process."
"A fine plan, apart from it being an insanely audacious one that will almost certainly get everyone killed."
"A fine plan, apart from it being an insanely audacious one that will almost certainly get everyone killed."

languages.text: « Un excellent plan, à un détail près : il est d'une audace folle qui risque de nous coûter la vie à tous. »
languages.original_text: "A fine plan, apart from it being an insanely audacious one that will almost certainly get everyone killed."

traits.locale_text: « Un excellent plan, à un détail près : il est d'une audace folle qui risque de nous coûter la vie à tous. »

languages.text: «Es un buen plan, excepto por el hecho de que es increíblemente arriesgado y es casi seguro que acabe con todos nosotros muertos».
languages.original_text: "A fine plan, apart from it being an insanely audacious one that will almost certainly get everyone killed."

traits.locale_text: «El plan está bien, excepto por el detalle de que es una insensatez extrema que probablemente nos mate a todos en el intento».

languages.text: “这个计划还不错，只是它过于疯狂、过于鲁莽，几乎肯定会把所有人都害死。”
languages.original_text: "A fine plan, apart from it being an insanely audacious one that will almost certainly get everyone killed."

traits.locale_text: “这个计划本身倒还不错，只是它过于疯狂、过于鲁莽，可能会把所有人都害死。”

languages.text: "Ein guter Plan, abgesehen davon, dass er irrsinnig verwegen ist und ihn vermutlich niemand überleben wird."
languages.original_text: "A fine plan, apart from it being an insanely audacious one that will almost certainly get everyone killed."

traits.locale_text: "Der Plan ist gut, abgesehen davon, dass er aberwitzig verwegen ist und vermutlich alle Beteiligten sterben werden."

languages.text: 「立派な計画だ。だが、とてつもなく大胆なものだし、ほぼ確実に全員殺されるだろう」
languages.original_text: "A fine plan, apart from it being an insanely audacious one that will almost certainly get everyone killed."

traits.locale_text: 「立派な計画だ。だが、とてつもなく大胆なものだし、ほぼ確実に全員殺されるだろう」

languages.text: "Neredeyse herkesin ölmesine sebep olacak kadar riskli olması dışında iyi bir plan."
languages.original_text: "A fine plan, apart from it being an insanely audacious one that will almost certainly get everyone killed."
